name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
effect: 2-Pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%.4-Pc: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150%/250% or higher, ignores 10%/18% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them.

slots.name: Iron Cavalry's Homing Helm
slots.story: The Swarm that covers the sky turns to dust in a sea of fire. Silvery-white snowflakes drift in deep space, reflecting the pallid light of the star. In this brief moment, the endless sound of buzzing and the commands in the communication channel finally dials down to silence.The Swarm attacking the "empire" has not been eradicated, and the next command to head to battle will ring out again after a brief pause, as it always did.The Iron Cavalry of the "empire" feels the external sensations passed to her via the deep spinal cord signals. She remembers what she felt the last time she was removed from the cockpit. The hot wind had lightly tousled her hair and the humid air soaked the tissue on the back of her neck, with droplets of sweat stuck to her skin. She does not hate that feeling. It is tenfold more lively than the simulated signals. The armor deeply synchronized its sensory organs with that of the pilot. Though this would worsen the pain of entropy loss, the Iron Cavalry has no other choice if they wish to defeat the Swarm."Rule 43 of the Glamoth Military Regulations. Any surviving Iron Cavalry members should voluntarily return to their regiment..."The fighter only realizes that the external sensory signals have tricked her when she sees the decapitated silver armor — The next command to head to the battlefield will never sound again. What a cruel brief reprieve.

slots.name: Iron Cavalry's Crushing Wristguard
slots.story: Glamoth's Iron Cavalry clenched their wristguards tight, causing the filthy carapaces of the Swarm to crack open, allowing the corrosive fluid from their abdomens to spray freely. When the insectoid fluid touched their Silvery Armor, it vaporized instantly, leaving only stains of filth and blood.The wreckage of armor and insectoid limbs scattered as deep-space debris, while around Glamoth, the "River of Death" flowed silently under the pull of gravity, marking the end of the bloody battle.The leaders of the council discussed the post-war situation, passing judgment on Titania, who had never wielded real power. They deemed her control over the Iron Cavalry, whose power rivaled that of the vermin, as the greatest threat to the Republic's survival... People rang the bells of peace, declaring to the populace that the Swarm would disperse, and the azure sky would return to the hands of the Republic."If we do not restrain the 'Empress,' who else can control these weapons?"The Iron Cavalry honed their iron fists' strength in their brief lives. But never did they imagine that those pale, feeble hands in the council, raised high, possessed the power to change Glamoth's fate.

slots.name: Iron Cavalry's Silvery Armor
slots.story: Several arcs of intense fire streaked across the night sky, surpassing the horizon where dawn rose, heading toward different sectors of Glamoth — a routine that the residents of the Republic were most familiar with and also feared the most.Silver-tinged armors soared through the skies, racing against time to reach the devastated battlefields, too preoccupied to contemplate the scenes they tirelessly guarded day and night.The Empress's orders brooked no argument. Identical-looking warriors with were birthed from the incubators, swearing allegiance to the Empress to reclaim Glamoth's skies. The Iron Cavalry traversed through the mountains of corpses and seas of blood of the buzzing flying insectoids, burning the charred remnants of the vermin's shells, shattering their colossal jaws and toothy remnants... The fate of Glamoth's Iron Cavalry was to endure the slow disintegration of entropy, burning fiercely on the brink of life and death.Until the flames were completely extinguished, until the insectoids that blotted out the sky turned into ashen black earth, until no one returned — such a routine would continue...What does it mean to be alive? As the acceleration of advancing armor tightly constricted their chests, and the piercing pain of entropy-induced numbness briefly surfaced on their bodies, they tasted a hint of what it meant to be alive.

slots.name: Iron Cavalry's Skywalk Greaves
slots.story: The Iron Calvary's tracks spread across every corner of Glamoth's "Empire," like blazing meteors, yet they could not escape the "dream" woven by Titania.The people of the Republic worried about the legion born for war, questioning how much overlap there truly was between the never-existing "Empire" and their familiar territories...The Empress bestows honor and faith upon her knights, and the Iron Calvary offer loyalty and commitment to the Empress... New humans continuously birthed from incubators, assigned numbers and missions. Old humans hide beneath steel barriers, anxiously enjoying the long-awaited peace they have yearned for. The deception of peace needed to be exposed by someone. The ways of war that shake human nature should not exist in the world. When the catastrophe fades, those with fearful hearts must completely destroy the distorted products of war...The Iron Calvary's greaves break through the sky. As long as they are willing, they can reach any star.However, the "Empire" is nowhere to be found. Before the Iron Calvary lies only a predetermined path — one end leading to death, the other to themselves.
